data.title: B Safe Post Plant Snake Bite
data.description: When playing the post plant situation, you can use this simple lineup from outside B Main to force retaking Defenders off the spike.

data.title: Toxic Screen and Stairs Poison Cloud B Main Execute
data.description: Use this combination of utility to execute the B Site, allowing for more possibility to play towards your Poison Cloud on site.

data.title: Tiles to A Site Wall Exec
data.description: Close off defenders' sight lines on A Site with this Toxic Screen lineup.

data.title: A Main to A Link Orb
data.description: Use this Poison Cloud lineup to shut down visibility from A Link.
